summary.para: Describes the multi-threading features that are supported by the current graphics driver.

remarks.para: Use the D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_THREADING structure with the method to determine multi-threading support.

summary.para: TRUE means resources can be created concurrently on multiple threads while drawing; FALSE means that the presence of coarse synchronization will prevent concurrency.
TRUE means command lists are supported by the current driver; FALSE means that the API will emulate deferred contexts and command lists with software.
